meta_description: Learn how Boc Menh (BMP) collects, uses and protects your personal information, including the Fates Points system when using services at bocmenh.com.
subtitle: Boc Menh at bocmenh.com and the entire Boc Menh ecosystem (hereinafter referred to as BMP)
intro_p1: When using BMP services and the Fates Points system, you trust us with your information. BMP understands this is a great responsibility and we strive to protect your information while giving you control.
intro_p2: This privacy policy aims to help you understand what information BMP collects, why we collect it, and how you can update, manage, export and delete your information, including Fates Points transaction data.

sections.title: 1. Scope of Application
points: Applies to all personal information that users provide when registering, using BMP services or any related services, sub-pages, mobile applications or APIs.
This personal information privacy policy applies to all devices, websites or online applications of BMP, including services that BMP provides through the website and mobile applications.
This policy does not apply to links to other pages outside the BMP ecosystem.
Special application to the Fates Points system and related payment transactions.

subsections.title: 2.1. Basic Personal Information
points: Full name, email when registering an account.
Biographical information: date of birth, time of birth, place of birth, ... to provide interpretation services.
IP address, device information, browser to ensure security.

subsections.title: 2.2. Transaction and Fates Points Information
points: Fates Points top-up history: amount, time, payment method.
Service usage history: service type, Fates Points consumed, usage time.
Payment information: processed through partners and no card information stored at BMP.
Transaction codes and payment status for customer support.

subsections.title: 2.3. Service Usage Data
points: Interpretation results and reports generated for users.
Access time, frequency of feature usage.
User feedback and reviews about services.

sections.title: 3. Purpose and Legal Basis for Use
points: Provide destiny consulting, feng shui, compatibility, astrology, tarot services as requested by users.
Process Fates Points top-up transactions and manage payment accounts.
Personalize experience, send service notifications, reminder emails, special offers.
Analyze service usage statistics, improve quality and develop new features.
Detect and prevent fraud, abuse of the Fates Points system.
Fulfill obligations to state agencies when legally required.
Targeted communication and marketing (with user consent).

sections.title: 4. Information Sharing and Transfer
points: BMP COMMITS NOT to share your personal information with third parties except for the authorized list below:
Licensed payment partners (Paypal, VietQR, banks, Visa/Mastercard) to authenticate and process Fates Points top-up transactions.
Email and SMS service providers (only sent when you agree to receive notifications).
Security and data analytics partners to prevent fraud.
Law enforcement agencies when legally required under Vietnamese law.
In case of business merger or acquisition, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.

sections.title: 5. Payment Information and Fates Points Security
points: End-to-end encryption: All Fates Points transactions are encrypted using 256-bit SSL/TLS with two-way token-based authentication.
No card information stored: BMP does not store card numbers, CVV codes, or any other sensitive information.
Transaction monitoring: The system automatically detects unusual or suspicious transactions.
Data backup: Fates Points history is regularly backed up.

sections.title: 6. User Rights Regarding Personal Data
points: Right to access: View all personal information and Fates Points transaction history.
Right to edit: Update personal information (except verified data).
Right to data export: Download all personal data in JSON/PDF format.
Right to data deletion: Request account and data deletion (Fates Points will become invalid).
Right to restrict processing: Refuse marketing emails, non-essential notifications.
Right to complain: Report security violations or improper data use.
Right to support: Contact security department to resolve issues.

sections.title: 7. Data Retention and Storage
points: Account data: Retained throughout the lifetime of the account and for 5 years after deactivation.
Fates Points transaction history: Permanently retained for auditing and legal purposes.
Divination data: Retained permanently or until the user requests deletion.
System logs: Retained for 2 years for security and incident analysis purposes.
Secure backups: All data is backed up with encryption on ISO 27001-certified cloud infrastructure.

sections.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
points: Essential cookies: Used to maintain login sessions and account security.
Analytics cookies: Google Analytics is used to understand user behavior (can be declined).
Advertising cookies: Used to display relevant ads (can be declined).
Pixel tracking: Used to measure the effectiveness of email marketing (only with consent).
Management options: Users can manage cookies through their browser settings.
No data selling: BMP is committed to not selling cookie information to third parties.

sections.title: 9. Security and Incident Response
points: 24/7 security policy: Continuous monitoring of suspicious activities.
Data breach response: Users will be notified within 72 hours in case of an incident.
Security updates: The system is regularly updated with security patches.

sections.title: 10. International Data Transfer
points: Primary servers: Located in Vietnam, fully compliant with local laws.
International backups: Backups may be stored in Singapore with equivalent security standards.
Transfer protection: All data transfers are encrypted and governed by confidentiality agreements.
Transparent notifications: Any changes to storage locations will be announced at least 30 days in advance.

sections.title: 11. Privacy Policy Changes
points: Advance notice: All changes will be posted automatically without prior notice.
Public posting: New versions posted on policy page with change notes.
Right to refuse: Users have the right to refuse changes by closing their account.
